About Me

Hello! I am an electronics engineer with a passion for Artificial Intelligence and technological innovation. My journey combines expertise in developing practical Machine Learning and LLM solutions with a user-centered approach, always striving to turn complex challenges into products that generate real value.

My experience allows me to act as a strategic bridge between business demands and the best technical solutions, translating complex requirements into intuitive and powerful tools. Today, I help companies and projects build scalable and integrated AI solutions, from architectural definition to the implementation of complete pipelines ‚Äî always with a focus on efficiency and innovation.
